description:
IDR is seeking a Workday Financials Customer Account Lead to join one of our top clients remotely. If you are looking for an opportunity to join a large organization and work within an ever-growing team-oriented culture, please apply today!

Position Overview For The Workday Financials Customer Account Lead

  • Lead and manage the configuration, implementation, and maintenance of the Workday Financials system with a primary focus on Customer Accounts.
  • Ensure the accurate setup and management of customer accounts within the Workday system.
  • Provide expertise in Workday Financials to optimize processes and workflows.
  • Support the financial accounting team with Workday Financials functionalities.

Required Skills For The Workday Financials Customer Account Lead

  • Proven experience in Workday Customer Accounts.
  • Workday Financials Certification is mandatory.
  • Experience in Banking & Settlement and Financial Accounting is highly desirable.
  • Strong understanding of financial processes and accounting principles.

What’s in it for you?

  • Competitive compensation package
  • Full Benefits; Medical, Vision, Dental, and more!
  • Opportunity to get in with an industry leading organization
  • Close-knit and team-oriented culture

Why IDR?

  • 25+ Years of Proven Industry Experience in 4 major markets
  • Employee Stock Ownership Program
  • Dedicated Engagement Manager who is committed to you and your success
  • Medical, Dental, Vision, and Life Insurance
  • ClearlyRated’s Best of Staffing® Client and Talent Award winner 11 years in a row

Compensation Details: $56 - $63/hr W2
